pages.text:
Plan Your Wedding at Eagle Harbor
Eagle Harbor Golf Club on Fleming Island
At Eagle Harbor we are committed to helping you plan the event of a lifetime: your wedding. We set the scene for the most beautiful weddings in the Jacksonville area, with an expert team to ensure every detail is carried out flawlessly. Located 21 miles southwest of downtown Jacksonville, Eagle Harbor Golf Club is situated on beautiful Fleming Island, FL. The premiere setting for your event, the Club offers 3,700 sq. ft. of event space in addition to gorgeous outdoor features that surround the professionally-designed golf course.
Eagle Harbor is beautifully nestled on the southeastern shore of Doctors Lake, tucked away next to the St. Johns River that runs through nearby Jacksonville. Water views are prominent at Eagle Harbor, and wedding guests enjoy stunning reminders of the natural landscape wherever they look. Coupled with immaculately-manicured greens and fairways, water elements provide a natural habitat for some of Florida’s most beautiful flora and fauna. You can feel confident your guests will find the views to be simply stunning! Say “I do” with friends family gathered on lush grounds and enjoy the idyllic setting for memories that will last a lifetime.
We understand that every couple has a vision for what they want their day to be. That’s why our team is trained to listen to your desires and work with you to make them come true.
Learn More About Our Wedding Services
At Your Service
We’re focused on making your Florida wedding completely customized, working with you on every detail so it turns out the way you’ve always dreamed. Let your imagination roam and the team will help make your vision come to life. With constant communication and proper follow-through on every detail, it all comes together like a well-staged performance with you and your new spouse center stage!
Catering
: Catering options are completely customized to suit taste, budget, and style, prepared to your liking by a top-notch culinary team
Planning
: Imagination and professionalism of Jacksonville’s best event planner at your service from day one, all the way through your ceremony and reception.
Ceremony
: An idyllic lawn with water feature views will set the stage for a beautiful ceremony everyone will remember forever
Views
: The modern and elegant banquet facility is beautifully appointed with magnificent details and views of lush greens
Bar
: A fully-stocked bar for your occasion, complete with our professional, friendly in-house bartenders
Start Planning Now
Still in the planning stages? Schedule a tour! Our wedding planner loves talking to new couples and will be happy to give a tour and answer all of your questions about hosting your wedding at Eagle Harbor. When you book an appointment to find out about hosting your wedding with us, you will meet with Eagle Harbor’s wedding expert, and discuss how to plan your special event flawlessly. From a cozy evening gathering to an all-day event, we'll guide you through all the options available to you.
Expect the Best
You’ll fall in love with our wedding venue and once you get to know the wedding team, you’ll fall in love with them too! We take our role seriously as a premier Jacksonville area wedding destination. We expect the best from our team so that you can expect the best in everything for your special day. Call us today or request an appointment online. We can’t wait to meet you and get started on planning your big day!
The Eagle Harbor Wedding Experts are available at (904) 269-9300, ext. 5 to answer any questions that you may have.
“I would like to thank you for everything that you did to plan, prepare us for Kelsey & David’s wedding. This was the first of 4 weddings to come and I didn’t know where to begin. You eased my mind and told me exactly what to expect and what we needed to do. Thank you so very much. It was a beautiful day and a perfect experience for us. The venue was perfect, the food was delicious. Everything ran according to plan. So many guests called me the next day and are still saying it was the sweetest, most beautiful wedding they’ve ever attended. Thank you again so very much for your warm, upbeat, friendly personality, your professionalism and the hard work you put into our event.” - Ashley, Mother of the Bride
“I would like to thank you for everything that you did to plan, prepare us for Kelsey & David’s wedding. This was the first of 4 weddings to come and I didn’t know where to begin. You eased my mind and told me exactly what to expect and what we needed to do. Thank you so very much. It was a beautiful day and a perfect experience for us. The venue was perfect, the food was delicious. Everything ran according to plan. So many guests called me the next day and are still saying it was the sweetest, most beautiful wedding they’ve ever attended. Thank you again so very much for your warm, upbeat, friendly personality, your professionalism and the hard work you put into our event.” - Ashley, Mother of the Bride
“I would like to thank you for all the hard work you provided us leading up to and on our big day. We could not have done this without you!! We truly had no idea how much work, planning and preparation a wedding entailed. Although we know better….you made it look effortless from beginning to end…everything was amazing and so are you!!” - Geraldine, Eagle Harbor Bride
Wedding Request
SharpSpring Form for Weddings

Thank you for your interest in Eagle Harbor Golf Club! Join us and enjoy the many benefits and privileges of Club life, as well as the lifelong friendships and fond memories you'll create here. There are no distractions, no interruptions, just quality family time, business networking and endless fun – right in your own backyard. We invite you to enjoy life to its fullest at Eagle Harbor Golf Club and discover the place the neighborhood meets.
There are many types of Memberships that will enable someone to find the type of Club experience that fits your needs. You can also complete the inquiry form below and one of our Membership specialists will be in touch shortly.
Membership Request
SharpSpring Form for Membership Information

Plan Your Event At Eagle Harbor
Whether it’s a corporate gathering, birthday party, baby shower, banquet, anniversary or other special occasion, Eagle Harbor Golf Club is committed to helping you plan the perfect event. The premiere setting for your event, located 21 miles southwest of downtown Jacksonville, Eagle Harbor is situated in the heart of northeast Florida between the St. Johns River and Doctors Lake on beautiful Fleming Island, FL. The club offers fabulous event spaces and gorgeous outdoor features including the Banquet Room, Wine Room, Back Patio, Ceremony location and a Get-Ready Suite. Our elegant meeting and event facilities can accommodate as little as 10 people for an intimate cocktail reception or meeting, up to 130 guests for sit-down dining and dancing. Professional and experienced staff will help make your event memorable, beautiful and stress-free.
Eagle Harbor is a full-service club providing all your food and beverage needs. Our acclaimed culinary team will prepare delicious meals to your specifications whether it’s a small intimate dinner or a large grand event. With a wide range of options available, our catering menus can be customized to suit your taste, budget, and style, offering the best in both service and value. No matter if your event is causal and laid-back or an elegant full-blown affair with the works, we can help you achieve the perfectly planned event. We bring together creativity and professionalism to every occasion and our team members are dedicated, friendly and care about making you and your guests feel comfortable and at home.
REQUEST AN APPOINTMENT
At Eagle Harbor we can offer you complete event support with a seasoned professional staff who will help with all the details to make your event memorable for you and your guests. Call us today or request an appointment online. We can’t wait to meet you and get started on planning your event!
SharpSpring Form for Special Events Information
